Header: Four monks including Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera granted bail
Content: The Colombo Fort Magistrate’s Court has decided to enlarge on bail four Buddhist monks including the Ven. Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera who were produced in Courts today. The Colombo Fort Magistrate’s Court recently ordered to arrest and produce in Courts four Buddhist monks who were accused of damaging public property in between a protest staged by disabled war heroes in 2016. The accused monks were the Ven. Bengamuwe Nalaka Thera, the Ven. Ittekande Saddhatissa Thera, the Ven. Magalkande Sudatta Thera and the Ven. Medille Pagnaloka Thera. They were produced in Courts today and Magistrate Lanka Jayaratne granted them bail.
